summary: At the end of WW II, German deserters are tried for desertion by fellow POWs inside a prisoner of war camp for Nazis.
cast: Franco Nero|Richard Johnson|Larry Aubrey|Helmuth Schneider|Michael Goodliffe|Relja Basic|Emilio Delle Piane|Enrico Osterman|Osvaldo Ruggieri|Renato Romano|T.P. McKenna|Graham Armitage|Torello Angeli|Jan Larsson|Sven Lasta|Demeter Bitenc|Rade Serbedzija|Mato Grkovic|Bud Spencer|Romano Ghini|Zlatko Madunic
title: Y Dios est√° con nosotros
